title: Early genomic characterization of Influenza B/Jakarta/2026
abstract: We report the isolation of a reassortant Influenza B virus with potentially enhanced transmissibility. The hemagglutinin gene shows 98% identity to...
key_findings: Novel HA surface protein mutation detected.
Reduced efficacy of current season trivalent vaccine suspected.

title: Clinical presentation of the 2026 Jakarta Cluster
abstract: A retrospective analysis of 50 hospitalized patients shows high incidence of secondary bacterial pneumonia...
key_findings: Median age of hospitalized patients is lower than seasonal average.
